文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_042_chunk1
证据片段: small specimens (60 by 10 by 1 mm) are attached to holders inside hollow fuel elements and irradiated within a Materials Test Bundle (MOB) capable of delivering a fast-neutron flux (E > 1 MeV) of about 5 × 10¹⁷ n/m²·s
工艺步骤: hot extrusion at 1090 K, cold drawing 20-30%, stress relieving at 673 K for 24 h
额外性质: {"microstructure": "slightly elongated grains of single phase α-Zr containing a distribution of second-phase intermetallic particles", "specimen_dimensions": "60×10×1 mm", "irradiation_duration": "60-120 days"}

文献ID: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_042_chunk1
证据片段: small specimens (60 by 10 by 1 mm) are attached to holders inside hollow fuel elements and irradiated within a Materials Test Bundle (MOB) capable of delivering a fast-neutron flux (E > 1 MeV) of about 5 × 10¹⁷ n/m²·s
工艺步骤: hot extrusion at 1090 K, cold drawing 20-30%, stress relieving at 673 K for 24 h
额外性质: {"microstructure": "two-phase, consisting of elongated α-Zr grains surrounded by a β-Zr network", "specimen_dimensions": "60×10×1 mm", "irradiation_duration": "60-120 days"}

证据片段: Specimens include Zircaloy-2 and Zr-2.5Nb pressure tube samples in both the pickled and prefilmed conditions
